sectionHeading: Weekend Events / Traffic Impacts for June 1 - 2

day: Closure Scheduled for the Georgetown Rd Bridge at New Circle Rd:
event: Saturday June 1 (between 12 p.m. and 8 p.m.) thru Monday September 30 (24 Hrs/Day for the summer months).

day: Closure Scheduled for the Georgetown Rd Bridge at New Circle Rd:
event: The outbound side of the bridge will be CLOSED after the Newtown Pike interchange is fully open.

day: Closure Scheduled for the Georgetown Rd Bridge at New Circle Rd:
event: Traffic will be diverted to the inbound side of the bridge with the following configuration:

day: Closure Scheduled for the Georgetown Rd Bridge at New Circle Rd:
event: One thru lane open in each direction along with a left turn lane.

day: Closure Scheduled for the Georgetown Rd Bridge at New Circle Rd:
event: The closure is necessary for demolition of the existing bridge and construction of a new bridge.

day: Closure Scheduled for the Georgetown Rd Bridge at New Circle Rd:
event: Use added caution while traffic adjusts to the traffic pattern change.
